timeline.message: Hide photo for gqr and rqg
Hide photo for grq and rgq

timeline.bodyText: Would be cleaner if there was an else clause in the tm-view-photo-popover instead of the whole conditional userToEmail... copied over
timeline.author: t-cheepeng
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -2,14 +2,20 @@
     *ngIf="responses.length && responses[0].allResponses.length">
   <div class="col-md-3">
     <div>
-      <tm-view-photo-popover [photoUrl]="userToEmail[responses[0].allResponses[0][this.isGrq ? 'recipient' : 'giver']] | formatPhotoUrl: session.courseId">
+      <tm-view-photo-popover *ngIf="userToEmail[responses[0].allResponses[0][this.isGrq ? 'recipient' : 'giver']]" [photoUrl]="userToEmail[responses[0].allResponses[0][this.isGrq ? 'recipient' : 'giver']] | formatPhotoUrl: session.courseId">
         {{ isGrq ? 'To' : 'From' }}: {{ responses[0].allResponses[0][this.isGrq ? 'recipient' : 'giver'] }} {{ teamInfo[isGrq ? 'recipient' : 'giver'] }}
       </tm-view-photo-popover>
+      <ng-container *ngIf="!userToEmail[responses[0].allResponses[0][this.isGrq ? 'recipient' : 'giver']]">

replies.bodyText: Thanks for the tip. Will change to an else clause.
replies.author: ccyccyccy

timeline.bodyText: If there is a default value, ? is not necessary.
timeline.author: wkurniawan07
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,27 @@
+import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core';
+
+/**
+ * Display student name with photo popover
+ */
+@Component({
+  selector: 'tm-student-name',
+  templateUrl: './student-name.component.html',
+  styleUrls: ['./student-name.component.scss'],
+})
+export class StudentNameComponent implements OnInit {
+
+  @Input()
+  name: string = '';
+
+  @Input()
+  courseId?: string = '';
+
+  @Input()
+  email?: string = '';

timeline.message: Rename component to be more precise
